00022 #pragma once
00023 
00024 #if defined(__GXX_RTTI) || !defined(L4_NO_RTTI)
00025 #  include <typeinfo>
00026    typedef std::type_info const *L4_std_type_info_ptr;
00027 #  define L4_KOBJECT_META_RTTI(type) (&typeid(type))
00028    inline char const *L4_kobject_type_name(L4_std_type_info_ptr n)
00029    { return n ? n->name() : 0; }
00030 #else
00031    typedef void const *L4_std_type_info_ptr;
00032 #  define L4_KOBJECT_META_RTTI(type) (0)
00033    inline char const *L4_kobject_type_name(L4_std_type_info_ptr)
00034    { return 0; }
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 namespace L4 {
00038 
00050 struct Type_info
00051 {
00052   L4_std_type_info_ptr _type;
00053   Type_info const *const *_bases;
00054   unsigned _num_bases;
00055   long _proto;
00056 
00057   L4_std_type_info_ptr type() const { return _type; }
00058   Type_info const *base(unsigned idx) const { return _bases[idx]; }
00059   unsigned num_bases() const { return _num_bases; }
00060   long proto() const { return _proto; }
00061   char const *name() const { return L4_kobject_type_name(type()); }
00062   bool has_proto(long proto) const
00063   {
00064     if (_proto && _proto == proto)
00065       return true;
00066 
00067     if (!proto)
00068       return false;
00069 
00070     for (unsigned i = 0; i < _num_bases; ++i)
00071       if (base(i)->has_proto(proto))
00072   return true;
00073 
00074     return false;
00075   }
00076 };
00077 
00078 
00085 template<typename T>
00086 inline
00087 Type_info const *kobject_typeid()
00088 { return &T::__Kobject_typeid::_m; }
00089 
00090 
00094 #define L4____GEN_TI(t...)                             \
00095 Type_info const t::__Kobject_typeid::_m =                                \
00096 {                                                      \
00097   L4_KOBJECT_META_RTTI(Derived),                       \
00098   &t::__Kobject_typeid::_b[0], sizeof(t::__Kobject_typeid::_b) / sizeof(t::__Kobject_typeid::_b[0]), PROTO   \
00099 }
00100 
00104 #define L4____GEN_TI_MEMBERS()                                     \
00105 private:                                                           \
00106   template< typename T > friend Type_info const *kobject_typeid(); \
00107 protected: \
00108   struct __Kobject_typeid { \
00109   static Type_info const *const _b[];                              \
00110   static Type_info const _m;    };                                 \
00111 public:                                                            \
00112   static long const Protocol = PROTO;
00113 
00114 
00136 template< typename Derived, typename Base, long PROTO = 0 >
00137 class Kobject_t : public Base
00138 { L4____GEN_TI_MEMBERS() };
00139 
00140 
00141 template< typename Derived, typename Base, long PROTO >
00142 Type_info const *const Kobject_t<Derived, Base, PROTO>::__Kobject_typeid::_b[] =
00143 { &Base::__Kobject_typeid::_m };
00144 
00148 template< typename Derived, typename Base, long PROTO >
00149 L4____GEN_TI(Kobject_t<Derived, Base, PROTO>);
00150 
00151 
00174 template< typename Derived, typename Base1, typename Base2, long PROTO = 0 >
00175 class Kobject_2t : public Base1, public Base2
00176 { L4____GEN_TI_MEMBERS() };
00177 
00178 
00179 template< typename Derived, typename Base1, typename Base2, long PROTO >
00180 Type_info const *const  Kobject_2t<Derived, Base1, Base2, PROTO>::__Kobject_typeid::_b[] =
00181 {
00182   &Base1::__Kobject_typeid::_m,
00183   &Base2::__Kobject_typeid::_m
00184 };
00185 
00189 template< typename Derived, typename Base1, typename Base2, long PROTO >
00190 L4____GEN_TI(Kobject_2t<Derived, Base1, Base2, PROTO>);
00191 
00192 #undef L4____GEN_TI
00193 #undef L4____GEN_TI_MEMBERS
00194 
00195 }
